articles.headline: Tracking quality of life
articles.summary: An in-depth examination of the state of children in Northeast Ohio using data-driven storytelling to create a report-card approach.

articles.headline: Taking the pulse of a body of water
articles.summary: A look at the health of Puget Sound using various indicators of pollution, exploring sources and impacts on marine life.

articles.headline: Database reporting shows no-bid deals
articles.summary: An investigation into no-bid government contracts in Tennessee, revealing potential corruption and cronyism.

articles.headline: State cars sit, waste tax money
articles.summary: An examination of underused state vehicles in Arizona, highlighting wasteful spending amidst a budget shortfall.
